Translations.Text: I tid ixedmen laao di tlawin nnwen, awit ed, fellasent, kue inagan nnwen. Ma cehhden d, kemnet pent di texxamin, alamma teddem itent tmeppant, ne$ Iga yasent Oebbi abrid
Wid segwen it ixedmen, aaqbet pen. Ma nedmen, u xedmen ayen ilhan, anfet asen. Oebbi, s tidep, Izga Issuruf, Ipeunu
Issuruf kan Oebbi i wid ixedmen cceoo ur eoin, sinna, steooaen, war laavil. Widak, ad asen Issuref Oebbi. Oebbi Izga d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ur illi usuref i wid ixedmen tucmitin. Alamma, mi d tusa yiwen tmeppant, a d yini: "nek steooae$ tura". Akken, wid immuten u nitni d ijehliyen. Widak, Nhegga yasen d aaaqeb aqeoean

A wid iumnen! Ur awen ieell ara a pweoten tilawin, ur qbilent, ne$ ad asent tekksem jjwao, iwakken a ppawim amur seg wayen i sent tefkam, siwa ma xedment laao ibanen. Illit yidsent, s lqanun. Ma tkeohem tent, ahat tkeohem ayen ideg Irra Oebbi lxio meqqwoen
Ma teb$am a pbedlem tameiiut s tayev, u tefkam tuccit i yiwet, ur as tekkset acemma. Ma tekksem, d ayen n dir u d abekkav n uuee
Amek ara tekksem imi temyekcamem, u bbwint s$uowen laaqed meqqwoen
Ur ppa$et tilawin i u$en ibabaten nnwen, kkes ed ayen iaaddan. Ayagi, s tidep, d laao, d dduni, d yir brid
